001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.TxOutSetInfo;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.service.TxOutSetService;
008
009import java.net.URI;
010
011import static java.lang.System.out;
012
013/**
014 * Sample command-line tool that subscribes to ChainTip and TxOutSetInfo
015 */
016public class TxOutSetWatcherSample {
017    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
018        Network network = BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET;
019        String rpcUser = "bitcoinrpc";
020        String rpcPassword = "pass";
021        URI rpcUri = URI.create("http://localhost:8332");
022        boolean useZmq = true;
023
024        try (   RxBitcoinClient client = new RxBitcoinClient(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword, useZmq);
025                TxOutSetService txOutSetService = new TxOutSetService(client) ) {
026
027            // Subscribe to ChainTips
028            client.chainTipPublisher()
029                    .subscribe(TxOutSetWatcherSample::onChainTip, TxOutSetWatcherSample::onError);
030
031            // Blocking subscribe to TxOutSetInfo
032            txOutSetService.getTxOutSetPublisher()
033                    .blockingSubscribe(TxOutSetWatcherSample::onTxOutSetInfo, TxOutSetWatcherSample::onError);
034
035        }
036    }
037
038    static void onChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
039        out.printf("Chain tip: %s/%s\n", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash());
040    }
041
042    static void onTxOutSetInfo(TxOutSetInfo info) {
043        out.printf("TxOutSetInfo: %s/%s, utxos: %s, total BTC: %s\n",
044                info.getHeight(),
045                info.getBestBlock(),
046                info.getTxOuts(),
047                info.getTotalAmount().toFriendlyString());
048    }
049
050    static void onError(Throwable t) {
051        out.println("Error: " + t);
052    }
053}
